keywords.value: Grill Room, Four Seasons Restaurant (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The restaurant, which redefined American dining and gave birth to the power lunch, is leaving the space it has occupied since 1959.

headline.main: Four Seasons, Lunch Spot for Manhattan’s Prime Movers, Moves On

snippet: The restaurant, which redefined American dining and gave birth to the power lunch, is leaving the space it has occupied since 1959....
abstract: Four Seasons, iconic restaurant where so-called power lunch was born, will soon serve its last meal at Seagram Building, its midtown Manhattan location for almost 60 years; closing is seen by many as end of era in New York City, despite assurances from owners new version will reopen not far from original location; restaurant's American fine dining history mirrors that of city, adapting to economic downturns, trends and other changes while always remaining nexus of talent, money and ambition.
